冷静地；镇定地；不慌不忙地；从容地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指风暴、风雪和水等冷得使人感到如刺如割。
最普通用词，强调缺乏温暖，使人不舒服。
指使人僵直，使东西凝固的冷。
指雾气在寒冷物体的表面凝结成薄冰时的严寒结霜的温度。

word_group.brief_definition: 冷静下来；冷却下来；冷静
保持冷静；沉住气；保持凉爽
(在困难的情况下)保持冷静, 沉着
沉着应付, 冷静处理, 不动声色, 努力显得冷静
不受炎热困扰的；轻松自在的；镇定自若的；十分冷静的
不受炎热困扰的；轻松自在的；镇定自若的；十分冷静的

bilingual.source: At once she was buried up to the elbow in long, cool, silky, tickly hair.
bilingual.target: 她的手肘立刻埋在了长长的、凉爽的、丝滑的、痒痒的毛发中。

bilingual.source: Jos is known for its cool climate.
bilingual.target: 乔斯以其凉爽的气候而闻名。
提摩西草在凉爽的气候中生长良好。
西南风带来了凉爽的空气。

bilingual.source: We found a cool spot under the tree.
bilingual.target: 我们在树荫下找到了一个凉爽的地方。
大黄在凉爽的气候中生长良好。

bilingual.source: She likes to run in the cool mornings.
bilingual.target: 她喜欢在凉爽的早晨跑步。

bilingual.source: The cool breeze is freshening the room.
bilingual.target: 凉爽的微风正在使房间清新。

bilingual.source: Bandung is famous for its cool climate.
bilingual.target: 万隆以其凉爽的气候而闻名。

bilingual.source: The cool breeze waft the leaves gently.
bilingual.target: 凉爽的微风轻轻地飘荡着树叶。

list.abstract: cool，音标[kuːl]，英语单词。作形容词是指凉快的、冷淡的、酷的，作名词指的是凉快、平静、酷，作动词是指变凉、变凉快、冷静。例句：That sounds cool. I want to be a volunteer,too.（听起来很酷。我也想成为一名志愿者。） cool的近义词：philosophical，cracking，calmly等。
COOL通“酷”,“酷”，这个词是近些年青少年流行语中最具有代表性的一个重要词语。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the movie was great, dinner was great, and there's nothing like a cool, crisp New York evening.
yingyinNormal.zh: 电影很好看，晚餐很好吃，凉爽的纽约夜晚最宜人。

yingyinNormal.en: Cool. No. Not cool. Unhygienic and lonely and boring.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好酷。不，一点也不酷。 既不卫生，又寂寞，还无聊。

yingyinNormal.en: I had a pretty cool dad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有个很酷炫的爸爸。

yingyinNormal.en: Cool. Yeah. Come on Ben.
yingyinNormal.zh: 酷。来，班。

yingyinNormal.en: Nina! Mr. Douglas. Cool tie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妮娜。道格拉斯先生，领带不错。

yingyinNormal.en: Cool. All right man, have fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，行了哥们儿，好好玩吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Cool. So are you in a loft now?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不错啊，你现在住跃层吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, that was actually very cool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 刚才那招实在是酷。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: You turned on me, Harold. Not cool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你背叛我，哈罗德，不厚道。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, sorry, I thought you were cool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是我不好，我还以为你很潮呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Which Leonard was too cool to wear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德居然觉得这胸牌配不上他。

yingyinNormal.en: Cool. Tell me more about these CDOs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那好。和我多说点相关信息。

yingyinNormal.en: So, where is this really cool place?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个很酷的地方是在哪里呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, cool. Urkel in Spanish is Urkel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乌克这个名字在西班牙文中叫“乌酷”。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, cool. Wow, it's like a time capsule.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，酷，就像一个“时空胶囊”。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. And hey, it's cool if you're a lesbian.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有，如果你是同志就太酷了。

yingyinNormal.en: Cool. Did she discover a cure for something?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不错，她是研发出某种疾病的解药之类的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: That would be cool. I'd go to that reception.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那太酷了，我得去那个招待会。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. No, not really. Well, that's cool. So did…
yingyinNormal.zh: 那倒不会。那就好，那你…

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, thank you Rachel, you are so cool. Stop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你，你好酷。别这么说。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 沉着的; 平静; 使冷静
凉爽的; 凉快; 变凉

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 冷静下来；冷却下来；冷静

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 不流行的；给人印象不深的；不酷的

word_family.mean: adj. 凉快的；凉爽的；冷淡的；不热心的；酷的；整整的；不折不扣的；清凉的；冷静的；不错

sense_info_list.en: calm and not worried or frightened; not influenced by strong feeling of any kind
sense_info_list.zh: 沉着的; 平静; 使冷静

examination_example.sentence: Simply slowing the pace and talking in an even tone helps the other person <highlight>cool</highlight> down and does the same for you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简单地放慢节奏，并用平和的语气说话，有助于对方冷静下来，对你也是如此。

examination_example.sentence: If you consistently lose you <highlight>cool</highlight> with your kids, then you are inadvertently modeling a lack of emotional control for your kids.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你总是对你的孩子失去冷静，那么你就在不经意间为你的孩子塑造了一个缺乏情绪控制的典型。

sense_info_list.en: slightly cold in a pleasant way
sense_info_list.zh: 凉爽的; 凉快; 变凉

examination_example.sentence: A string of accidents, including the partial collapse of a <highlight>cooling</highlight> tower in 2007, raised serious questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一连串的事故，包括2007年冷却塔部分倒塌，引发了严重的问题。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 冷的; 冷藏的; 冷却
轻描淡写的; 冷淡的

examination_example.sentence: Examine types of sentences they use, and focus on stories you feel you could write a pretty <highlight>cool</highlight> sequel to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 检查他们使用的句子类型，关注那些你觉得可以写一个极好的续集的故事。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 制冷装置；冷却容器；高杯饮料；监狱；牢房；冷却器；冷藏箱；冰袋；凉瓶器

word_family.mean: adj. 凉快的；凉爽的；冷淡的；不热心的；酷的；整整的；不折不扣的；清凉的；冷静的；不错

examination_example.sentence: Children usually don't have good judgement and are prone to imitate the violent behaviours in games and regard them as being <highlight>cool</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子通常没有很好的判断力，容易模仿游戏中的暴力行为，并认为他们这样很时髦。

examination_example.sentence: He thought it was <highlight>cool</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他觉得这很时髦。

examination_example.sentence: When I first got my cellphone, I thought it was so <highlight>cool</highlight> to text message all my friends who have one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我第一次拥有手机的时候，我觉得给所有有手机的朋友发短信是一件很时髦的事。

sense_info_list.en: slightly cold in a pleasant way

examination_example.sentence: Including everything from helping to protect the lives of firefighters to keeping homes <highlight>cool</highlight> in summer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 包括从帮助保护消防队员的生命到在夏天保持房屋凉爽。

examination_example.sentence: The ants' method of staying <highlight>cool</highlight> is unique among animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蚂蚁保持凉爽的方法在动物中是独一无二的。

sense_info_list.zh: 冷的; 冷藏的; 冷却

examination_example.sentence: In Sweden, they have a really <highlight>cool</highlight> system called "Study Circles", where it's not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在瑞典，他们有一个极好的系统叫做“学习圈”，但它并不是。

sense_info_list.en: calm and not worried or frightened; not influenced by strong feeling of any kind

指使人僵直，使东西凝固的冷。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 冷静下来；冷却下来；冷静

examination_example.sentence: Helping the poor is <highlight>cool</highlight> because it can give them hope and bring me pleasure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帮助穷人很酷，因为这能给他们希望，给我带来快乐。

examination_example.sentence: He has discovered his own way to be <highlight>cool</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他发现了自己变酷的方法。

examination_example.sentence: For the first time in my life, I actually felt <highlight>cool</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有生以来第一次，我真的觉得很酷。

examination_example.sentence: Keep the room <highlight>cool</highlight> rather than warm to avoid feeling sleepy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保持房间凉爽而不是温暖，以免感到困倦。

examination_example.sentence: The air was so different from the city, <highlight>cool</highlight> and fresh.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里的空气与城市截然不同，凉爽清新。

examination_example.sentence: Increasing Earth's reflectiveness can <highlight>cool</highlight> the planet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 增加地球的反射率可以给地球降温。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 冷静下来；冷却下来；冷静
保持冷静；沉住气；保持凉爽

examination_example.sentence: "My favorite thing about the pangolin is the scales it has on its body. They look <highlight>cool</highlight>. "Landon said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我最喜欢穿山甲的是它身上的鳞片。它们看起来很酷。”兰登说。

examination_example.sentence: "I think it's <highlight>cool</highlight> to learn about other countries'culture and express your feelings to others." said Xu.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我认为了解其他国家的文化并向他人表达你的感受很酷。”徐说。

examination_example.sentence: That sounds <highlight>cool</highlight>.I want to be a volunteer,too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听起来很酷。我也想成为一名志愿者。

examination_example.sentence: He described excitedly to me the wonderful feeling of the <highlight>cool</highlight> river water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他兴奋地向我描述清凉河水的美妙感觉。

examination_example.sentence: In the park, you can feel the <highlight>cool</highlight> air coming from the lake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在公园里，你可以感受到来自湖面的凉爽空气。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Cool</highlight> air came up through small holes in the tables.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 凉爽的空气从桌子上的小孔中冒出来。

examination_example.sentence: The students are often told to keep <highlight>cool</highlight> by teachers when facing emergencies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面对紧急情况，老师经常告诉学生保持冷静。

examination_example.sentence: A growing body of research now shows that yawning is nature's way of keeping our brains <highlight>cool</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的研究表明，打哈欠是大自然保持大脑冷静的方式。

examination_example.sentence: All morning I could feel the boys in the <highlight>cool</highlight> group looking angrily at me, but John didn't seem to notice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 整个上午，我都能感觉到不友好团队的男孩们愤怒地看着我，但约翰似乎没有注意到。
